depthDescriptions.BASIC: These foundational questions help us understand the basics of who you are and what you're looking for.
depthDescriptions.ADVANCED: These questions invite a bit more reflection, helping us see the nuances of your personality and values.
depthDescriptions.EXPERT: These are deep-dive questions that reveal your core beliefs and how you navigate complex situations.

visibility.visibleDesc: This answer will be shared with potential matches upon your approval of a suggestion.
visibility.hiddenDesc: This answer is for the matchmaking team only and will not be shared with matches.

hero.title: The NeshamaTech Smart Questionnaire
hero.subtitle: This isn't just a form—it's an invitation to a guided journey of self-discovery. Your thoughtful answers are the key that unlocks truly compatible matches.

worldsSection.title: Explore the Five Worlds of You
worldsSection.subtitle: Our questionnaire is structured as a passage through five essential aspects of your life, creating a holistic and authentic profile.

PERSONALITY.title: Personality
PERSONALITY.description: Discover your core traits, energy sources, and communication style.

VALUES.title: Values
VALUES.description: Define the principles that guide your life and your vision for the future.

RELATIONSHIP.title: Partnership
RELATIONSHIP.description: Explore your expectations for communication, intimacy, and daily life together.

PARTNER.title: The Partner
PARTNER.description: Clarify the essential qualities and characteristics you're seeking in a partner.

RELIGION.title: Religion
RELIGION.description: Detail your spiritual connection, practices, and vision for a Jewish home.

featuresSection.title: A Process Built on Trust and Insight
featuresSection.subtitle: We designed every step to be respectful of your time and your journey.

features.title: Smart & Efficient
features.description: An average journey of 45 minutes that saves you countless hours on irrelevant matches.

features.title: Completely Confidential
features.description: Your answers are a private conversation between you and your matchmaking team.

features.title: Reveals Deeper Truths
features.description: Go beyond surface-level details to uncover the essence of what makes a connection last.

finalCta.title: Ready to Tell Your Story?
finalCta.subtitle: Your next chapter begins with a single, thoughtful step.

reviewCard.title: Review Your Answers
reviewCard.description: You can view, edit, and manage the visibility of your answers at any time in your profile.

subtitles.PERSONALITY: The foundation of who you are and how you navigate the world.
subtitles.VALUES: Your internal compass for life's most important decisions.
subtitles.RELATIONSHIP: Your blueprint for partnership, communication, and a shared daily life.
subtitles.PARTNER: Clarifying the essential qualities and values you're seeking in a partner.
subtitles.RELIGION: Your personal connection to faith, tradition, and your vision for a Jewish home.

completionBanner.title: Magnificent, {{name}}!
completionBanner.subtitle: You've completed the entire questionnaire.
completionBanner.description: Our team now has a rich, holistic understanding of you. We're excited to begin searching for your match.

PERSONALITY.title: World of Personality: Who Am I, Truly?
PERSONALITY.subtitle: The first step to a deep match is presenting an authentic and accurate picture of yourself.
PERSONALITY.whyIsItImportant: Here, we go deep. Instead of superficial labels, we'll understand your inner dynamics: what recharges your energy, how you function in social settings, and what drives your decisions. A rich personality profile is the foundation for finding someone with whom the dynamic will feel natural from the very start.
whatYouWillDiscover: Your daily energy profile (a morning or night person).
How your 'social battery' truly works.
The core traits you identify with most strongly.
Your natural style of communication and problem-solving.
PERSONALITY.guidingThought: The goal isn't to find a carbon copy of yourself, but the missing piece that completes your puzzle.

VALUES.title: World of Values: What Drives Me?
VALUES.subtitle: Shared values are the backbone of a stable relationship. Here, we'll distill your internal compass.
VALUES.whyIsItImportant: This is the most critical world for long-term success. We don't just ask if 'family is important'; we ask you to prioritize between career, spirituality, giving, and personal growth. The high-quality data we gather here allows us to prevent foundational gaps in worldview.
whatYouWillDiscover: What your life priorities look like today.
Your vision for priorities within a partnership.
Your definition of success and a 'rich' life.
Your approach to money, giving, and personal development.
VALUES.guidingThought: When your values walk in the same direction, you'll always find each other again, even when your paths diverge.

RELATIONSHIP.title: World of Partnership: What is 'Us'?
RELATIONSHIP.subtitle: We'll understand your vision for connection, communication, intimacy, and shared daily life.
RELATIONSHIP.whyIsItImportant: A great relationship is more than a feeling; it's a practical partnership. In this world, we'll uncover your 'love language,' how you handle conflict, and your ideal balance between 'together' and 'apart.' This is the key to creating a bond based on understanding, respect, and true friendship, even in challenging moments.
whatYouWillDiscover: What makes a relationship feel like 'home' for you.
The most effective way to communicate with you.
How you envision the distribution of roles and responsibilities.
Your deepest emotional needs from a partner.
RELATIONSHIP.guidingThought: The question isn't 'Will you be happy?', but rather 'How will you handle things together when you're not?'.

PARTNER.title: World of the Partner: Who Am I Seeking?
PARTNER.subtitle: Instead of a checklist, we'll focus the search on what is truly essential for you in a partner.
PARTNER.whyIsItImportant: Here, we make the search precise and efficient. Instead of casting a wide net, you'll define the core traits that are non-negotiable, the relevant range of backgrounds and ages, and most importantly, your deal-breakers. Focus is the key to saving precious time and emotional energy.
whatYouWillDiscover: The character traits that are most important to you.
Your practical preferences (age, background, lifestyle).
The 'red lines' you are unwilling to compromise on.
Where you are flexible and willing to bridge gaps.
PARTNER.guidingThought: Don't look for the person you can live with; look for the person you can't imagine living without.

RELIGION.title: Religion & Tradition: What is My Connection?
RELIGION.subtitle: Understanding your personal connection to Judaism is a necessary foundation for building a faithful home.
RELIGION.whyIsItImportant: In the Jewish world, 'religious' is a word with infinite shades of meaning. Here, we get down to the precise details: from your self-definition on the spectrum, to how Halacha and tradition are expressed in your life, to your vision for your children's education. This is the basis for spiritual and marital harmony.
whatYouWillDiscover: Your precise location on the religious spectrum.
What your Shabbat and Kashrut observance looks like in practice.
Your worldview on modesty, community, and Torah education.
Your vision for the religious and spiritual atmosphere in the home you'll build.
RELIGION.guidingThought: A Jewish home is built not only with bricks, but with prayers, values, and tradition passed from one generation to the next.

unauthenticatedPrompt.subtitle: Sign in or create an account to save your answers.

faq.title: Questionnaire FAQ
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions about the journey.
faq.emptyState: No questions found matching your search.

answer.content: Yes, if you are logged into your account, your progress is saved automatically in the background. You will see a 'Last saved' timestamp appear. You can also manually save at any time. If you are not logged in, your progress is saved only to your current browser session.
To ensure your progress is never lost, we highly recommend creating an account or logging in before you begin.

time-to-complete.question: How long does the questionnaire take?

answer.content: We recommend setting aside 45-60 minutes of quiet, reflective time to complete the entire journey. You don't have to do it all at once! The questionnaire is divided into five 'worlds', and you can complete them at your own pace.

answer.title: Our Recommendation
answer.content: Try to complete one full 'world' in each session. This helps maintain your flow of thought and leads to more cohesive answers.

required-questions.question: Do I have to answer every question?

answer.content: Not all of them, but we encourage it! Questions marked as 'Required' are essential for our matching algorithm to function effectively. Other questions, while optional, provide crucial nuance that helps your matchmaker understand you better and find higher quality connections for you.
The more you share, the more accurately we can find someone who truly complements you.

how-matching-works.question: How are my answers used for matching?

answer.content: Your answers are the primary data source for our unique matching process:

content: Our AI algorithm analyzes your responses across all five worlds to identify patterns, priorities, and potential compatibility scores with other users.
Your personal matchmaker reviews both the data and your open-text answers to understand the person behind the profile.
The system highlights promising matches for the matchmaker, who then uses their human intuition and experience to make the final decision on whether to suggest a match.
Your answers also help us craft the 'Why we think this could work' rationale that accompanies every suggestion you receive.

answer.content: Your privacy is our highest priority. By default:

content: Only your dedicated matchmaking team can view your complete set of answers.
You have control over each answer's visibility. You can mark sensitive answers as 'Hidden', making them visible only to the matchmaking team.
When a match is suggested, a curated selection of your 'Visible' answers is shared with the potential match, but only after you approve the suggestion.

answer.content: We never share your data with third parties. You are always in control of your story.

edit-answers.question: Can I change my answers later?

answer.content: Of course. We understand that people grow and perspectives change. You can return to your profile at any time to review and edit your answers to the questionnaire. We actually recommend reviewing your answers every 6-12 months to ensure they still reflect who you are.

The match percentage is a guide, not a verdict. It's a score generated by our algorithm based on dozens of compatibility factors from the questionnaire. It represents the potential for alignment in values, personality, and lifestyle. However, it's the matchmaker's job to look beyond the number and see the human connection, which is why every suggestion is personally vetted.

incomplete-questionnaire.question: What happens if I don't complete the whole questionnaire?

answer.content: While you can receive matches with a partially completed questionnaire, its effectiveness is significantly reduced. Completing all required questions across the five worlds is necessary to be fully active in our matching pool and to receive the most accurate, high-quality suggestions.

inactive-account.question: What happens if my account is inactive?

answer.content: For security and to ensure our matching pool remains active, users who are inactive for an extended period (typically over 2 hours) will be automatically logged out. You can always log back in to continue where you left off.
